00030 /**
00031  * Flexform builder class
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Flexform_Builder
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * An array with the flexform sheets
00042      */
00043     protected $_sheets       = array();
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * Wheter to disable the handling of localizations
00047      */
00048     protected $_langDisable  = true;
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * Wheter the localizations are bound to the defaut values
00052      */
00053     protected $_langChildren = false;
00054     
00055     /**
00056      * The file with the language labels
00057      */
00058     protected $_langFile     = '';
00059     
00060     /**
00061      * Class constructor
00062      * 
00063      * @param   string  The reference of the file with the labels for the flexform (typically: EXT:extkey/path/to/lang/file)
00064      * @param   boolean Wheter to disable the handling of localizations
00065      * @param   boolean Wheter the localizations are bound to the defaut values
00066      * @return  NULL
00067      */
00068     public function __construct( $langFile, $langDisable = true, $langChildren = false )
00069     {
00070         $this->_langFile     = ( string )$langFile;
00071         $this->_langDisable  = ( boolean )$langDisable;
00072         $this->_langChildren = ( boolean )$langChildren;
00073     }
00074     
00075     /**
00076      * Converts the flexform object to an XML string
00077      * 
00078      * @return  string  The XML for the flexform
00079      */
00080     public function __toString()
00081     {
00082         // Gets the simple XML object
00083         $xml = $this->createXmlObject();
00084         
00085         // Returns the XML code
00086         return $xml->asXML();
00087     }
00088     
00089     /**
00090      * Gets the flexform as a simple XML object
00091      * 
00092      * @return  SimpleXMLElement    The flexform XML object
00093      */
00094     public function createXmlObject()
00095     {
00096         // Creates the XML object
00097         $xml                     = new SimpleXMLElement( '<T3DataStructure></T3DataStructure>' );
00098         
00099         // Adds the localization options
00100         $xml->meta->langDisable  = ( int )$this->_langDisable;
00101         $xml->meta->langChildren = ( int )$this->_langChildren;
00102         
00103         // Creates the sheets object
00104         $sheets = $xml->addChild( 'sheets' );
00105         
00106         // Process each sheet
00107         foreach( $this->_sheets as $key => $value ) {
00108             
00109             // Creates the sheet XML object
00110             $value->addSheetXmlObject( $sheets );
00111         }
00112         
00113         // Returns the XML object
00114         return $xml;
00115     }
00116     
00117     /**
00118      * Adds a sheet to the flexform
00119      * 
00120      * @param   string                              The name of the sheet
00121      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet               The sheet object
00122      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Builder_Exception   If the sheet already exists
00123      */
00124     public function addSheet( $name )
00125     {
00126         // Checks if the sheet already exists
00127         if( isset( $this->_sheets[ $name ] ) ) {
00128             
00129             // The sheet already exists
00130             throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Builder_Exception(
00131                 'The sheet \'' . $name . '\' already exists. Please use the ' . __CLASS__ . '::getSheet() method instead.',
00132                 tx_oop_Flexform_Builder_Exception::EXCEPTION_SHEET_ALREADY_EXISTS
00133             );
00134         }
00135         
00136         // Creates the sheet
00137         $this->_sheets[ $name ] = new tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet( $name, $this->_langFile );
00138         
00139         // Returns the sheet
00140         return $this->_sheets[ $name ];
00141     }
00142     
00143     /**
00144      * Gets a flexform sheet
00145      * 
00146      * @param   string                              The name of the sheet
00147      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Sheet               The sheet object
00148      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Builder_Exception   If the sheet does not exist
00149      */
00150     public function getSheet( $name )
00151     {
00152         // Checks if the sheet exists
00153         if( isset( $this->_sheets[ $name ] ) ) {
00154             
00155             // Returns the sheet
00156             return $this->_sheets[ $name ];
00157         }
00158         
00159         // No such sheet
00160         throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Builder_Exception(
00161             'The requested sheet does not exist (' . $name . '). You should first add it with the ' . __CLASS__ . '::addSheet() method.',
00162             tx_oop_Flexform_Builder_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_SHEET
00163         );
00164     }
00165     
00166     /**
00167      * Decides wheter to disable the handling of localizations
00168      * 
00169      * @param   boolean If true, the handling of localizations will be disabled
00170      * @return  NULL
00171      */
00172     public function setLangDisable( $value )
00173     {
00174         $this->_langDisable = ( boolean )$value;
00175     }
00176     
00177     /**
00178      * Decides wheter the localizations are bound to the defaut values
00179      * 
00180      * @param   boolean If true, the localizations will be bound to the defaut values
00181      * @return  NULL
00182      */
00183     public function setLangChildren( $value )
00184     {
00185         $this->_langChildren = ( boolean )$value;
00186     }
00187 }
